abstract: Eight Iranian border guards and three militants are killed in two separate clashes near country's border with Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: The border guards were killed in Sistan-Baluchistan Province, and in a separate attack, a news agency said, the Revolutionary Guards broke up a “terror team.”

headline.main: Iranian Border Guards Are Killed in Fighting Near Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Iranian Border Guards Are Killed in Fighting Near Pakistan

snippet: The border guards were killed in Sistan-Baluchistan Province, and in a separate attack, a news agency said, the Revolutionary Guards broke up a “terror team.”
